attributes.action: Reinforce court orders to those mothers that still refuse access
attributes.additional_details: Mothers get away constantly with ignoring court orders for fathers being able to see their children. They should be punished in the same way as any other court order, they are not above the law. In any other circumstance this would not be acceptable, so why should this be accepted?
attributes.background: So many parents are alienated after a the relationship breaks down, court applications are made and orders put in place, but orders are still ignored with no punishment. Fathers are just as important.
